short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CompeteIQ extension to import news while user is browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CompeteIQ chrome extension plugin, this plugin gives the ability to our users to add news items while browsing the web when using chrome browser.
